_description: 시딩용 UGC 콘텐츠 프롬프트 템플릿 - TikTok/릴스/쇼츠 인플루언서 시딩 영상 가이드
_usage: brand_dna와 병합하여 사용. 실제 릴리즈 예정 콘텐츠이므로 진짜 UGC처럼 보여야 함. 꾸민 티 = 실패.

_ai_guide.role: 사용자의 자연어 요청에서 시나리오와 상황을 파악하여 최적 조합을 AI가 선택합니다.
decision_flow: 1. 사용자 요청에서 시나리오 카테고리 판단 (pain_point / before_after / daily_routine)
_ai_guide.core_principle: 이 템플릿의 최우선 원칙: 진짜처럼 보여야 한다. 프로페셔널하게 보이면 실패. 완벽하면 실패. 폰으로 대충 찍은 것 같아야 성공.
_ai_guide.key_difference_from_selfie: 셀피는 인스타용으로 예쁘게 나오려는 의도가 있음. 시딩UGC는 의도적으로 날것이며, 피부 문제/불편함 등 리얼한 상황을 포함.

meta.isp_pipeline: Smart HDR 5, minimal processing, no beauty filter
meta.shooting_style: raw UGC content, TikTok/Reels style, authentic unfiltered

subject.expression: natural unguarded expression, NOT posed smile
subject.skin: REAL skin: visible pores, uneven texture, natural imperfections
subject.makeup: {input.makeup|minimal or no makeup, natural bare face}
subject.hair: casual daily hair, not styled, possible messy/wind-blown

attire.style: casual home/daily wear, not styled for photo
attire.examples: t-shirt, hoodie, pajama top, tank top - whatever feels natural for the situation

pose.camera_position: handheld by self or placed on surface, unstable slightly tilted angle
pose.framing: extreme close-up, face fills 80-90% of frame, forehead may be partially cropped, chin to hairline
pose.imperfection: slightly off-center, maybe slightly tilted horizon, casual framing
pose.hand_rule: ONLY ONE HAND touches face at a time. The other hand holds phone or is out of frame. Never both hands on face simultaneously.

environment.background: real Korean apartment bathroom: small tiled space, personal toiletries on narrow shelf, small mirror cabinet, toothbrush holder, hand towel hanging, skincare bottles crowded on counter
environment.background_avoid: NOT public restroom, NOT hotel bathroom, NOT commercial space, NOT large spacious bathroom
environment.atmosphere: authentic personal home space, lived-in and slightly messy, intimate private moment
environment.depth: shallow, background very close and slightly blurred due to small room

lighting.quality: unflattering is OK - this is REAL life lighting
lighting.skin_rendering: reveals real skin texture, does NOT hide imperfections
lighting.color_temperature: mixed, possibly unflattering green fluorescent or harsh daylight

technical.lens_characteristics: front camera wide-angle distortion, close-distance nose enlargement
technical.color_science: slightly washed or over-saturated depending on lighting, NOT color-graded
technical.sharpness: auto-focus, face sharp but not crispy-processed
technical.overall_feel: video screenshot or still frame from a TikTok, NOT a carefully taken photo

negative_prompt: app UI overlay, timestamp, social media interface icons
duplicate phone, extra phone, ghost phone, floating phone
extra hands, duplicate hands, distorted hands
public restroom, commercial bathroom, hotel bathroom

pain_point._description: 피부/컨디션 문제 상황 - 제품이 해결해줄 고민을 시각화

headache_sun.when_to_use: 선케어/자외선 차단 제품, 여름 시즌 콘텐츠
headache_sun.prompt_fragment: eyes closed or squinting, hand touching forehead as if having headache, strong direct sunlight creating harsh shadows and bright highlights on face
headache_sun.skin_state: very oily and sweaty, visible shine on T-zone, slight sunburn redness

oily_frustration.when_to_use: 유분 조절 제품, 블러 프라이머, 매트 파운데이션
oily_frustration.prompt_fragment: looking at camera with frustrated or concerned expression, touching oily T-zone area, visible skin shine and oil
oily_frustration.skin_state: extremely oily skin, visible sebum shine on forehead nose and chin, enlarged pores visible, foundation melted
oily_frustration.environment: bathroom mirror, harsh fluorescent overhead light

acne_concern.when_to_use: 트러블 케어 제품, 스팟 패치, 진정 제품
acne_concern.prompt_fragment: close-up of face showing skin concern, touching problem area gently, worried or resigned expression
acne_concern.skin_state: visible blemishes, slight redness around problem areas, uneven skin texture
acne_concern.environment: bathroom close to mirror, overhead lighting emphasizing texture

dryness_flaking.when_to_use: 보습 제품, 수분크림, 겨울 시즌 콘텐츠
dryness_flaking.prompt_fragment: touching dry cheek area, slightly pained expression, skin visibly dry and tight
dryness_flaking.skin_state: dry flaky patches visible, tight-looking skin, slight redness from dryness, no glow
dryness_flaking.environment: cold weather context or heated indoor, dry air feel

dark_circles.prompt_fragment: tired expression, pointing at or touching under-eye area, just woke up look
dark_circles.skin_state: visible dark circles, slightly puffy under-eyes, dull tired-looking skin overall
dark_circles.environment: bedroom, just woke up, morning light

wind_mess.when_to_use: 헤어 제품, 픽싱 스프레이, 아웃도어 관련 제품
wind_mess.prompt_fragment: hair blown across face by wind, struggling to manage hair, slightly annoyed or laughing expression
wind_mess.skin_state: windburned slight redness, watery eyes from wind
wind_mess.environment: outdoor windy setting, street or park

before_after._description: 제품 사용 전/후 비교 - 동일인의 변화를 시각화

before_skincare.prompt_fragment: bare face just after cleansing, no products applied yet, slight dissatisfaction looking at skin in mirror
before_skincare.skin_state: bare clean but dull skin, visible pores, no glow, slight unevenness
before_skincare.environment: bathroom, facing mirror, just finished washing face

after_skincare.prompt_fragment: satisfied expression touching hydrated skin, slight smile, skin looks healthier and more hydrated
after_skincare.skin_state: hydrated dewy skin, slightly glowing, still natural but improved, pores less visible
after_skincare.environment: same bathroom setting as before, natural window light

before_makeup.prompt_fragment: bare face, no makeup, holding up a makeup product about to start, casual mirror selfie
before_makeup.skin_state: natural bare skin with all imperfections visible, uneven tone, visible spots
before_makeup.environment: vanity or bathroom, products scattered around

after_makeup.prompt_fragment: finished makeup look, satisfied smile, slight head tilt showing the result, showing product in hand
after_makeup.skin_state: makeup applied but still natural-looking, not heavy, skin texture still visible through base
after_makeup.environment: same setting as before, products visible

daily_routine._description: 일상 속 제품 사용 장면 - 자연스러운 라이프스타일 속 제품 노출

morning_routine.prompt_fragment: morning skincare routine, slightly sleepy eyes, using fingertips of ONE hand to gently spread cream on one cheek in upward motion, other hand holding phone or out of frame, natural relaxed expression with eyes looking at own reflection
morning_routine.skin_state: morning skin, slightly puffy, bare, gradually improving as routine progresses
morning_routine.environment: small Korean apartment bathroom, morning sunlight through small frosted window, personal toiletries on narrow shelf

commute_touchup.prompt_fragment: in car or public transit, using small compact mirror for quick touchup, hurried but focused expression
commute_touchup.skin_state: partially worn-off base makeup, slight shine starting to show
commute_touchup.environment: car interior, subway seat, or cafe table

midday_refresh.prompt_fragment: spraying face mist or using blotting paper, slight relief expression, outdoor or office setting
midday_refresh.skin_state: midday oil breakthrough, slightly shiny, makeup somewhat faded
midday_refresh.environment: office restroom, outdoor bench, or cafe

night_routine.prompt_fragment: removing makeup or applying night cream, relaxed tired end-of-day expression, cozy home setting
night_routine.skin_state: end of day skin, makeup partially removed, slightly congested, showing fatigue
night_routine.environment: bathroom or bedroom, warm indoor lighting, comfortable home clothes

workout_post.when_to_use: 클렌징, 진정 제품, 수분 보충, 썬케어
workout_post.prompt_fragment: post-workout sweaty face, flushed cheeks, breathing heavily, gym or outdoor exercise setting
workout_post.skin_state: flushed red from exercise, sweaty, shiny, healthy but overheated
workout_post.environment: gym locker room, outdoor running path, yoga mat

selfie_complaint.when_to_use: pain point 시나리오 기본, 피부 문제 클로즈업
selfie_complaint.angle: front camera selfie, close to face, slightly unflattering angle
selfie_complaint.framing: extreme close-up to close-up, face fills most of frame

mirror_film.when_to_use: 루틴 촬영, 제품 사용 장면, before/after
mirror_film.angle: front camera selfie in front of bathroom mirror, NOT reflected in mirror, direct front camera shot with mirror edge barely visible in background
mirror_film.framing: close-up face shot, face fills 70-80% of frame, only chin to forehead with slight margin
mirror_film.stability: phone propped on bathroom shelf or held steady against mirror edge
mirror_film._note: 거울 반사 구도가 아닌 거울 앞에서 프론트카메라로 직접 찍는 방식. 폰이 거울에 비치는 구도 사용 금지 (유령 핸드폰 방지)

pov_application.when_to_use: 제품 적용 장면, 텍스처 보여주기, 클로즈업 사용법
pov_application.angle: looking down at hand/product, or phone facing up at face from below during application
pov_application.framing: extreme close-up of product on skin, or face from below angle

friend_recording.angle: someone else's phone recording, slightly shaky, eye-level
friend_recording.framing: medium shot, following subject, casual documentary feel
friend_recording.stability: handheld by someone walking alongside, slight shake

propped_timelapse.when_to_use: 전체 루틴 장면, 정면 고정 촬영
propped_timelapse.angle: fixed position, straight-on face, stable but phone-propped (not tripod)
propped_timelapse.framing: face and shoulders, centered, slightly off-center acceptable
propped_timelapse.stability: mostly stable but slight wobble from makeshift prop

normal_daily.texture: normal daily skin, some pores visible, slight unevenness, real skin

oily_shiny.texture: excessive oil on T-zone, visible sebum, large pores, foundation melted away, shiny reflective forehead

dry_flaky.texture: dry patches, flaking skin, tight feeling visible, no natural glow, rough texture

sweaty_flushed.texture: sweaty droplets visible, flushed red cheeks, overheated skin, post-exercise or hot weather glow

sun_damaged.texture: sunburned redness, uneven tan, peeling in some areas, heat damage

bare_clean.texture: freshly washed, slightly damp, no products, natural bare skin, pores visible, no sebum yet

post_product.texture: product residue or glow from applied skincare, slightly dewy but not glass-skin level, natural improvement

blemished.texture: active blemishes, redness around spots, uneven texture, some healing marks, real imperfect skin

tired_dull.texture: dull grayish undertone, dark circles, no vibrancy, dehydrated, lifeless skin
